description:
Dino comes from the to the Vongola Base. Seeing the gallant Dino atop his Box Weapon, Cavallo Alato, makes everyone realize the what a difference a decade makes. It seems Reborn wanted everyone to wait until the following day to begin their Box Weapon training because he wanted Dino’s help. But without his assistant Romario around, Dino is as inept as he always has been. Dino brought with him a special box for their training, but it ends up being the source of a big scare at the Vongola Base…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恐怖! アジト大騒動
